column4: I too am wondering about the new ATI 8.42.3 ... I'm on an ATI Radeon Mobile X1300 and fglrxinfo says I'm currently at version 8.37.6  I read that i will no longer need use XGL if I use the new driver .. can anyone verify?
I'm running 8.42.3 drivers and didn't need XGL
was it diffictul to install the driver? what guide did you use if any?
was it difficutl installing the driver? what guide did you use if any?
